publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4139 Kenneth Gibson: Twilight Walk 2009—That the Parliament encourages active participation in the Twilight Walk 2009, a five to 10 mile walk to raise money for breast cancer care in Scotland; notes that this event will take place on 23 May 2009 on the Isle of Cumbrae; recognises that last year the event hosted almost 400 walkers who raised over £20,000, which subsequently benefited the Breast Cancer Institute in Edinburgh and the Western Infirmary’s Breast Cancer Unit in Glasgow; acknowledges the work of Breast Foot Forward in organising the event, and notes that further information can be found at www.breastfootforward.org.

S3M-4139 Twilight Walk 2009 (lodged on 13 May 2009) Joe FitzPatrick*, Jamie McGrigor*, Ken Macintosh*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Aileen Campbell*, Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Butler*, Mike Pringle*, Bill Kidd*

S3M-4139 Kenneth Gibson: Twilight Walk 2009—That the Parliament encourages active participation in the Twilight Walk 2009, a five to 10 mile walk to raise money for breast cancer care in Scotland; notes that this event will take place on 23 May 2009 on the Isle of Cumbrae; recognises that last year the event hosted almost 400 walkers who raised over £20,000, which subsequently benefited the Breast Cancer Institute in Edinburgh and the Western Infirmary’s Breast Cancer Unit in Glasgow; acknowledges the work of Breast Foot Forward in organising the event, and notes that further information can be found at www.breastfootforward.org. Supported by: Joe FitzPatrick, Jamie McGrigor, Ken Macintosh, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Aileen Campbell, Jamie Hepburn, Stuart McMillan, Bill Butler, Mike Pringle, Bill Kidd, Robin Harper*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-4139 Twilight Walk 2009 (lodged on 13 May 2009) Gil Paterson*
